Name: Mental Health Trust
Context: Once it has been deemed necessary for a patient to receive a CPA (Care Program Approach), they will be assigned a Care Co-ordinator who will oversee the creation and updating of this record. Although care plans may currently be created at an earlier stage without the need for a CPA (e.g. by a General Practitioner), phase 1 of the NRLS will look to focus on the creation and return of care plans by Care Co-Ordinators only.

Name: Ambulance Service
Context: What is your role within the Ambulance Service? Depending on your positition, you may benefit differently from the NRLS once it is integrated into your system. For example a Clinician would immediatley benefit during hear and treat the patient. Or by the Paramedic team in the event of seeing and treating the patient simply because their systems are integrated into the NRLS and then can quickly see tht an important Care Plan exists for their Patient.
